try and tell us hwere your guys are instead of jsut saying they pop up
out of nowhere.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireBlade::
> FireBlade doesn't see the missiles coming from Sky Linx and is nailed
> with the first one in the side. He stumbles sideways and lookes to see
> the other three coming at him. He runs and uses his jump jets to pop
> up into the air. The missiles land beneath him and throw him forward
> closer to the CF.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > :::The Protectrons/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky
> >

Lynx/Orion/Hun-Grr/Cyclonus/Scourge/Fracas/Wheeljack/Banzai-Tron/Hurricane/Hel

> >
> > ::My Maximals see the battle going on.  They look for Targets::

> > ::Chromedome fires 25 rapid laser blasts from each gun at Razorclaw::
> > ~~~~~
> > ::Hardhead fires 25 crystal shards from each gun at Rampage::
> > ~~~~~

> > ~~~~~

> Sinnertwin::
> > ~~~~~
> > ::Ratchet fires 2 tusk missles and 15 shots from each blaster at

> > ::Cyclonus fires 25 rapid laser blasts at Prowl::

Grimmler::
> > ~~~~~
